news.title: AMD stock skyrockets 35% as OpenAI looks to take stake in AI chipmaker
news.summary: OpenAI will deploy up to 6 gigawatts of AMD Instinct GPUs over multiple years, beginning with a 1-gigawatt rollout in 2026.

news.title: Paul Tudor Jones says ingredients are in place for massive rally before a 'blow off' top to bull market
news.summary: Paul Tudor Jones said today's market is reminiscent of the setup leading up to the burst of the dotcom bubble in late 1999. He said the current market setup is similar to the setup that led to the dot-com bubble.

news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent to remain as IRS commissioner after filling role on temporary basis, sources say
news.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will remain in his role as IRS commissioner. A new official is to be announced as his top deputy.

news.title: Trump could 'start taking sharp measures' if next government funding bills fail: Hassett
news.summary: The Trump administration has warned that the shutdown will lead to federal employees getting laid off, rather than merely furloughed. The shutdown is now in its third week.

news.title: Verizon names former PayPal boss Dan Schulman as new CEO, replacing Hans Vestberg
news.summary: Verizon names former PayPal CEO Dan Schulman as the company's new CEO. He replaces Hans Vestberg, who has been with the company for more than a decade.

news.title: Firefly is beefing up its national security story, and the stock is soaring
news.summary: Firefly’s deal to acquire SciTech will bolster its efforts to support President Trump's “Golden Dome” missile-defense shield.

news.title: AMD’s stock soars 25%. Here’s why OpenAI wants a stake.
news.summary: OpenAI issued a warrant to purchase up to 160 million AMD shares. AMD got a big endorsement in the form of a multiyear chip deal with OpenAI.

news.title: Never mind France — it’s time to buy European stocks again, says JPMorgan
news.summary: JPMorgan books profits on Japan and recommends recycling those gains into Eurozone stocks. JPMorgan books profits in Japan, recommends recycling them into Euro zone stocks.

news.title: Fifth Third paying $10.9 billion for Comerica as wave of bank mergers builds
news.summary: Fifth Third and Fifth Third will operate in some of the fastest-growing areas of the country such as Texas. Fifth Third said combined company will operate.

news.title: Micron’s stock has doubled this year. Why Morgan Stanley is finally upgrading it.
news.summary: Morgan Stanley analyst says booming memory prices could drive “substantially higher earnings power” for Micron. “Better late than never,” he says.
